title: Zinc Chromate No. 1
provenance_text:
Alan Green [1932-2003]; Juda Rowan Gallery, London, England until October 1982; purchased by Mr. and Mrs. Edward Haskell [1920-1988], Pittsburgh, PA, October 30, 1982 until June 23, 1988 [1]; Jane (Mrs. Edward) Haskell [1923-2013], June 23, 1988 until May 28, 2013; partial gift to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1993, December 2005, and remainder bequest in September 2013.

Notes:
[1]. See invoice and receipt for Â£3,300 in curatorial file.
